name: If you are baking Popped Amaranth Crunch (using soaked nuts)

steps.step: Place nuts on a parchment-lined cookie skeet and bake at 250F for 10-20 minutes to dry them out. In a large glass bowl, mix together all ingredients and place back on the parchment-lined cookie sheet and bake for 10-15 more minutes. Allow to cool and serve. If any is leftover (ha), store in an airtight container in your pantry.
